___objectId.description: The AAD object identifier for the entity to create a policy for.

___minPriorityPerJob.description: The minimum priority per job this user can use to submit jobs. This property, the max degree of parallelism per job property, or both must be passed.

___maxDegreeOfParallelismPerJob.description: The maximum degree of parallelism per job this user can use to submit jobs. This property, the min priority per job property, or both must be passed.

___objectType.description: The type of AAD object the object identifier refers to.

___name.description: The name of the firewall rule to create or update.

$eref.description: The firewall rule properties to use when creating a new firewall rule.

___startIpAddress.description: The start IP address for the firewall rule. This can be either ipv4 or ipv6. Start and End should be in the same protocol.

___endIpAddress.description: The end IP address for the firewall rule. This can be either ipv4 or ipv6. Start and End should be in the same protocol.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___maxDegreeOfParallelism.description: The maximum supported degree of parallelism for this account.

___minPriorityPerJob.description: The minimum supported priority per job for this account.

___firewallState.description: The current state of the IP address firewall for this account.

___maxDegreeOfParallelismPerJob.description: The maximum supported degree of parallelism per job for this account.

___dataLakeStoreAccounts.description: The list of Data Lake Store accounts associated with this account.

___defaultDataLakeStoreAccount.description: The default Data Lake Store account associated with this account.

___queryStoreRetention.description: The number of days that job metadata is retained.

___newTier.description: The commitment tier for the next month.

___firewallAllowAzureIps.description: The current state of allowing or disallowing IPs originating within Azure through the firewall. If the firewall is disabled, this is not enforced.

___storageAccounts.description: The list of Azure Blob Storage accounts associated with this account.

___maxJobCount.description: The maximum supported jobs running under the account at the same time.

___computePolicies.description: The list of compute policies associated with this account.

___firewallRules.description: The list of firewall rules associated with this account.
